DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Ice-Sense , novel cryotherapy system ( system freeze tissue ) , safe effective treatment benign breast tumor fibroadenoma .
DOC.criteria: Patient 18 year old . Patient breast fibroadenoma , proven biopsy ( Core Biopsy ) . Patient 's fibroadenoma visualize ultrasound . Patient 's fibroadenoma size 0.5cm 3cm large dimension . Patient able visit clinic need 12month followup period follow cryoablation procedure . The patient inform study agree provision , sign IRB/EC approve write informed consent , include data privacy authorization . Patients history breast cancer . Women known pregnancy . Patients superficial fibroadenoma close skin . Patient undergone major surgery within previous 12 week . Patients terminal illness , life expectancy < 2 year . Patients carry contagious disease Tuberculosis Hepatitis AIDS . Patient participate trial use drug device .
